Description: Two bedroom apartment in a great location in the Back Bay! A great two bedroom layout with living room and a full appliance eat-in kitchen. Both bedrooms are of equal size that can fit queen sized beds, desks, etc. The unit is Southern facing Marlborough Street with great natural sunlight exposure. Fantastic location near newer restaurants on Mass. Ave., MIT, the Esplanade and Cambridge, as well as all major roadways and bus routes. Heat/Hot Water is included in the rent and the laundry is right next door at Back Bay Laundromat. Don t miss out!
